description: a(n) is square mod a(n-1) and prime.
comments: a(n-1) is a term in row a(n) of A046071. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 10 2015
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..1000
formula: a(n+1) is the least prime such that a(n) is a quadratic residue of a(n+1). - _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 29 2004
mathematica: f[n_] := Block[{k = PrimePi[n] + 1}, While[ JacobiSymbol[n, Prime[k]] == -1, k++ ]; Prime[k]]; NestList[f, 2, 54] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 16 2004 *)
prog: (Haskell)a034794 n = a034794_list !! (n-1)a034794_list = 2 : f 2 (tail  a000040_list) where   f x (p:ps) = if elem x $ a046071_row p then p : f p ps else f x ps-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 10 2015
author: _David W. Wilson_
